document_data.name: The River's Maw
document_data.mainbody: The '''River's Maw''' was the largest temple devoted to [[Sebek]], the [[Crocodile]] [[God]] within the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the city of [[Sekras]] in southern [[Unther]] on the banks of the [[Blue Sword River]].
document_data.History: Sebek's followers within the temple slowly turned the population of Sekras into [[werecrocodile]]s, prompting a violent response from [[paladin]]s sent by [[Osiris]] to scour the city, eventually leaving it in ruins.
